    TEST REPORT

   30-Jan-2010
***********************
 
*************************************
**  TESTING MODULE: sw_ptmp
**  and SUB-MODULE: sw_adtg.m
*************************************
 
********************************************************

with computed results from sw_ptmp on GLNX86 computer

**  TESTING MODULE: sw_satO2 sw_satN2 sw_satAr
**  and SUB-MODULE: sw_alpha.m sw_beta.m sw_aonb.m
*************************************
 
********************************************************

"The solubility of nitrogen, oxygen and argon in water and seawater."

with computed results from sw_satO2 sw_satN2 sw_satAr on GLNX86 computer
